In case of redistribution and transformation towards the material, you must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, indicate if changes were made, and may not use the material for commercial purposes.

development.title: Preview Build
development.description: You are currently browsing the development build

contribute.contribute_0: If you have experience with any of the following skills, and want to contribute to Penguin Statistics, please add QQ group: 747099627.
contribute.contribute_1: This is a nonprofit and open source project

skills.backend: Back End Development (Java Spring Boot, MongoDB)

failed.title: Failed to fetch resources
failed.subtitle: Unable to establish synchronized connection with neural network. Missing partial or all resources.

continue.first: Are you still want to submit this record?

contact.before: If you know that this is a mistake, we cannot be more happier if you
contact.after: (Please indicate the stage name, the actual drops, and screenshot is preferred for verification purposes) After confirming this is an error, our team will fix the limitation.

causes.limitation: Your current submission is having large mis-match with our existing data. Submitting this record will have a risk to be judged as a false-report, letting the current submission being deleted from our dataset.

type.gte: Should have at least {quantity} kinds of item
type.lte: Should have at most {quantity} kinds of item
type.not: Should not be {quantity} kinds of item
